ygData.subject: Re: dodge
ygData.msgSnippet: Nods, I am an ogre ... From: Robert Porter  To:  Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 1:52 PM Subject: [shadowknight]
ygData.messageBody:
Nods, I am an ogre
----- Original Message -----
From: Robert Porter <frog42@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 1:52 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] dodge


From: Robert Porter <frog42@...>

I believe 1 point is plent to put into dodge at first. It goes up very
quickly if you're a dark elf, and halfway through level 9 I had topped it
off. It seems like it fills up very quickly with each of my new levels, and
works pretty often when fighting. I'm very glad to have this skill, think
about it, you could potentially be completely avoiding an attack that would
cause you to lose the battle, and that's not interrupting your AC, so when
you dodge, you know they hit you, and you got lucky.

Kakarot Longwind :)
